## Bcp47.similarity() function

Determine how similar two language tags are to each other.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function similarity(t1: LanguageSpec, t2: LanguageSpec, options?: ILanguageTagInitOptions): Result<number>;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;number&gt;

A numeric value in the range 1.0 (exact match) to 0.0 (no match).
